name: Baldi is Stuck Remastered!
description:
Story: 

Some prankster in the school thought super glueing Professor Baldi to a chair was just a silly funny joke. And of course, Mr. Baldi did NOT see it that way and he will stop at nothing to find out who did this prank! And uhh... you accidentally left 7 of your Homeworks at the school while this mess was going around. Left with no choice, you decide to go inside the school after hours to get all your homeworks. Can you get all your homeworks before getting kicked out by the principal or caught by the very angry teacher, Baldi?

Credits:

Sibottle and siroofy - the here school signs.

Porky powers - Voicing Baldi, Bully, Gotta Sweep and Filename2.

TheBaldiModder425 - The Baldi stuck sprites and title screen.

Saintza - For the Baldi model. 

SuperInky - For the first prize model.

Angrygal - For the Baldi model on the here school sign.

If I forgotten others then let me know.
